Description:
The main character of Dragon Age II supports one of the few survivors of the destruction of his home. Now he is struggling to survive in a changing world, for powerful allies and occupy its rightful place in history. The game's story will tell you about how to change the virtual world once and for all. The plot of Dragon Age II extends for about ten years, and every decision has an effect on their development, but to become famous, you can go different ways. A new combat system lets you take a direct part in the great battles and end up in the heart of the battle, despite the relevant category of character. The graphics in Dragon Age II created a new engine, to make pictures more beautiful with more advanced effects.

Features:
- A full decade history of the world awaits and depends on the choices you make.
- Walk the path of a refugee to champion.
- Think like a general, fought like a Spartan with a new dynamic combat mechanics.
- Enter a world of Dragon Age deeper - by commercial cinema.
- Discover the world of gaming to a new level of graphics and detail.
